## Research Project 1

This is an one-year independent research that examines the differential impacts of various working conditions on the mental and
physical health of low-wage workers in two types of occupations–food delivery and retail–in China. Click [here](/research projects/project1.qmd) to see more details


## Research Project 2

Data Analysis on the fiscal health rank in California (on-going project in Stats 140XP class)
Click [here](/research projects/project2.qmd) to see more details

## Research Project 3

On-going project that analyzes the relationship between the distance of children with parents and the work-related mental and physical health of children using the National Longitudinal Dataset.
